tutorials.title: Beginner's Guide to S4TK
tutorials.text: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, Node, and the Sims 4 Toolkit library.

tutorials.title: Build Packages With S4TK
tutorials.text: Learn how to build loose tuning into packages with Sims 4 Toolkit.

tutorials.title: Interactive Tutorials
tutorials.text: Learn how to use the Sims 4 Toolkit library with guided tutorials.

tutorials.title: Auto-Assign Traits to Sims
tutorials.text: Learn how to assign traits to sims as they spawn into the world.

tutorials.title: Custom Tuning Tests
tutorials.text: Learn how to create your own custom tests sets for use in tuning.

tutorials.title: Inject by Super Affordance
tutorials.text: Learn how to add your interactions to all objects with existing interactions.

tutorials.title: Integrate Your Mod with LB
tutorials.text: Configure your mods to be better compatible with Language Barriers.
